Python Developer.overview: Master end-to-end Python engineering, from computer science depth to deployment-ready services.

milestones.title: Computer Science Foundations
milestones.details: Refresh data structures, algorithms, and complexity trade-offs using Python for implementation drills.
outcomes: Explain the runtime costs of lists, dicts, heaps, and graphs
Implement recursion-to-iteration refactors without performance loss

milestones.title: Idiomatic Python
milestones.details: Deep dive into the data model, context managers, and iterator/generator patterns.
outcomes: Use descriptors, dataclasses, and protocols intentionally
Author context managers with proper error handling

milestones.title: Data Structures in Practice
milestones.details: Build reusable libraries for trees, graphs, and streaming analytics workloads.
outcomes: Design custom containers with __slots__ and memory profiling
Benchmark pure Python vs C-accelerated options

milestones.title: Object Modeling and APIs
milestones.details: Model business domains using clean boundaries, dataclasses, and pydantic style validation.
outcomes: Translate messy requirements into cohesive class hierarchies
Guarantee invariants through validators and type hints

milestones.title: Testing Excellence
milestones.details: Level up pytest skills, property tests, and contract tests for services.
outcomes: Use fixtures and parametrization to shrink duplication
Adopt property-based testing for critical algorithms

milestones.title: Async and Concurrency
milestones.details: Blend asyncio, multiprocessing, and threading depending on workload types.
outcomes: Instrument event loops for back-pressure insights
Build resilient worker pools with graceful shutdown

milestones.title: Web Framework Mastery
milestones.details: Construct APIs with Flask, FastAPI, or Django using layered architecture.
outcomes: Isolate services and repositories for swap-friendly storage
Ship OpenAPI docs with automated tests

milestones.title: Data Access and Persistence
milestones.details: Work with SQLAlchemy, Redis, and event streams while respecting transactions.
outcomes: Profile ORM vs raw SQL paths

milestones.title: API Design & Contracts
milestones.details: Document, version, and secure REST plus background job interfaces.
outcomes: Version APIs without breaking old consumers
Implement RBAC, rate limiting, and observability hooks

milestones.title: Packaging & Tooling
milestones.details: Publish reusable packages, CLIs, and automation scripts.
outcomes: Configure pyproject builds and dependency groups

milestones.title: Observability & DevOps
milestones.details: Instrument metrics, tracing, and logs; set up CI/CD for Python apps.
outcomes: Harden pipelines with linting, tests, and security scans

milestones.title: Capstone & Storytelling
milestones.details: Deliver a production-style service with docs, tests, and deployment instructions.
outcomes: Summarize trade-offs made in architecture decisions

Web Developer.overview: Design delightful, accessible experiences across the full web stack with performance in mind.

milestones.title: Modern HTML Semantics
milestones.details: Revisit semantic tags, document outlines, and ARIA roles for rich applications.
outcomes: Structure content so screen readers announce context clearly

milestones.title: CSS Architecture
milestones.details: Practice fluid layouts, container queries, and design token pipelines.
outcomes: Ship responsive layouts without breakpoint bloat
Leverage logical properties to support RTL

milestones.title: JavaScript Systems
milestones.details: Strengthen knowledge of modules, async patterns, and browser APIs.
outcomes: Detect and fix event loop blocking work
Use Web Workers and BroadcastChannel intentionally

milestones.title: Accessibility in Practice
milestones.details: Run audits, keyboard testing, and color contrast reviews on representative flows.
outcomes: Build AXE automated checks into CI
Partner with users for manual screen reader testing

milestones.title: Design System Thinking
milestones.details: Create token libraries, documentation sites, and contribution workflows.
outcomes: Publishes tokens as CSS variables and JSON
Author usage guidelines with story-driven examples

milestones.title: Frontend Build Tooling
milestones.details: Tune bundlers, module federation, and asset pipelines for scale.
outcomes: Adopt code-splitting strategies that match routes

milestones.title: Backend Integration
milestones.details: Consume GraphQL/REST, handle caching, and model error states in UI.
outcomes: Represent optimistic updates with proper rollback

milestones.title: Performance & Observability
milestones.details: Instrument Core Web Vitals, profiling, and UX metrics dashboards.
outcomes: Budget assets and detect regressions via Lighthouse CI

milestones.title: Security & Privacy
milestones.details: Mitigate XSS, CSRF, clickjacking, and data exposure risks.
outcomes: Set strict CSP and sandbox headers
Design consent UX for analytics and cookies

milestones.title: Testing Strategy
milestones.details: Balance unit, integration, and visual regression testing.
outcomes: Share golden masters with design for review

milestones.title: Deployment Workflows
milestones.details: Plan blue-green or canary releases and observability for frontends.
outcomes: Roll back quickly using feature flags

milestones.title: Story-Driven Portfolio
milestones.details: Document case studies emphasizing user impact and measurable results.
outcomes: Show before/after metrics and code snippets

Data Scientist.overview: Blend rigorous analytics with production-minded machine learning practices.

milestones.title: Math Refresh
milestones.details: Reinforce linear algebra, probability, and statistics for model intuition.
outcomes: Explain variance, bias, and covariance structures

milestones.title: Data Acquisition & Cleaning
milestones.details: Practice ingesting messy datasets, handling missingness, and documenting lineage.
outcomes: Create reproducible data build tool (dbt) models
Version datasets with Delta or LakeFS

milestones.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
milestones.details: Use notebooks, profiling, and visualization to surface hypotheses.

milestones.title: Feature Engineering
milestones.details: Craft domain features, leakage checks, and encoding strategies.
outcomes: Codify feature contracts in a feature store

milestones.title: Modeling Toolkit
milestones.details: Train linear models, tree ensembles, and neural nets with hyperparameter rigor.

milestones.title: Evaluation & Experimentation
milestones.details: Interpret metrics, confidence intervals, and A/B or bandit designs.

milestones.title: Specialized Topics
milestones.details: Dive into NLP, computer vision, or recommender systems per interest.

milestones.title: MLOps Foundations
milestones.details: Integrate MLflow, model registries, and serving stacks.
outcomes: Track experiments with lineage and metrics
Deploy models behind APIs or streaming endpoints

milestones.title: Scaling Data Science
milestones.details: Use Spark/Dask, optimize storage, and manage pipelines.
outcomes: Tune distributed jobs for cost and latency

milestones.title: Responsible AI
milestones.details: Define governance, fairness metrics, and model documentation.

milestones.title: Productization & Storytelling
milestones.details: Translate findings into product narratives and dashboards.
outcomes: Connect models to revenue or cost impact

milestones.title: Portfolio & Thought Leadership
milestones.details: Publish case studies, notebooks, and reusable templates.
outcomes: Give talks or write blog posts summarizing insights

DevOps Engineer.overview: Build reliable, secure delivery systems that keep product teams shipping quickly.

milestones.title: Linux & Networking Refresh
milestones.details: Harden fundamentals: shells, permissions, TCP/IP, DNS, proxies.

milestones.title: Infrastructure as Code
milestones.details: Author Terraform/Pulumi stacks with modules, policies, and tests.

milestones.title: Containerization
milestones.details: Optimize Dockerfiles, layering, and supply-chain scanning.

milestones.title: CI/CD Design
milestones.details: Construct pipelines with templates, caching, and compliance gates.
outcomes: Measure pipeline lead time and flake rates

milestones.title: Observability
milestones.details: Standardize logs, metrics, traces, and alert tuning.

milestones.title: Security & Compliance
milestones.details: Embed threat modeling, secrets management, and compliance controls.

milestones.title: SRE Practices
milestones.details: Plan incident response, chaos testing, and capacity management.
outcomes: Run game days with clear hypotheses

milestones.title: Cloud Automation
milestones.details: Script AWS/Azure/GCP APIs, image pipelines, and drift detection.

milestones.title: Resilience Engineering
milestones.details: Model failure domains, circuit breakers, and regional evacuation plans.

milestones.title: Cost & Capacity Management
milestones.details: Implement FinOps dashboards and capacity planning models.
outcomes: Set automated budgets and anomaly alerts

milestones.title: Compliance & Audit Readiness
milestones.details: Map controls to SOC2/GDPR and automate evidence collection.

milestones.title: Platform Leadership
milestones.details: Teach enablement best practices and run internal consulting sessions.
outcomes: Define product KPIs for platform teams

Cybersecurity Analyst.overview: Develop a defender mindset spanning threat intel, detection, and governance.

milestones.title: Threat Landscape
milestones.details: Study current adversary tactics, MITRE ATT&CK, and industry reports.
outcomes: Prioritize risks by likelihood and impact

milestones.title: Networking & Protocols
milestones.details: Analyze packets, TLS handshakes, and common exploit vectors.

milestones.title: Identity & Access Management
milestones.details: Evaluate IAM policies, federation, and zero trust fundamentals.

milestones.title: Detection Engineering
milestones.details: Write detections in SIEM/EDR platforms with high signal-to-noise.

milestones.title: Incident Response
milestones.details: Craft runbooks, evidence handling, and communication protocols.
outcomes: Coordinate with legal and PR seamlessly

milestones.title: Cloud Security
milestones.details: Assess AWS/Azure/GCP security posture and native tooling.

milestones.title: Application Security
milestones.details: Review code, run DAST/SAST, and embed secure SDLC workflows.

milestones.title: Governance, Risk & Compliance
milestones.details: Map controls to frameworks like SOC2, ISO, HIPAA.

milestones.title: Security Automation
milestones.details: Leverage SOAR platforms, scripting, and APIs to scale response.

milestones.title: Adversary Simulation
milestones.details: Run purple team engagements and validate detections.

milestones.title: Reporting & Storytelling
milestones.details: Transform technical findings into executive-ready reports.

milestones.title: Continuous Learning
milestones.details: Set up labs, capture-the-flag practice, and community engagement.
outcomes: Stay current via feeds and ISACs

Mobile Developer.overview: Ship polished native experiences with resilient data layers and platform integrations.

milestones.title: Platform Foundations
milestones.details: Review Swift/Kotlin language updates, project structure, and tooling.

milestones.title: Architecture Patterns
milestones.details: Compare MVVM, MVI, and Clean Architecture for long-lived apps.
outcomes: Separate UI, domain, and data layers

milestones.title: Interface Craft
milestones.details: Design adaptive layouts, motion, and accessibility on mobile.
outcomes: Use dynamic type and dark mode

milestones.title: State Management
milestones.details: Coordinate state across views, background work, and system restarts.

milestones.title: Data & Sync
milestones.details: Use local stores, sync engines, and GraphQL/REST clients.

milestones.title: Performance Tooling
milestones.details: Profile rendering, memory, and battery consumption.

milestones.title: Device Capabilities
milestones.details: Integrate sensors, camera, notifications, and background tasks responsibly.
outcomes: Design fallback flows when hardware unavailable

milestones.title: Quality & Testing
milestones.details: Automate unit, UI, and snapshot tests with mocks and simulators.

milestones.title: Security & Privacy
milestones.details: Implement secure storage, attestation, and tamper detection.

milestones.title: Release Engineering
milestones.details: Plan beta testing, phased rollouts, and telemetry.
outcomes: Use feature flags for staged rollout

milestones.title: Analytics & Growth
milestones.details: Instrument funnels, retention cohorts, and experiment frameworks.

milestones.title: Polish & Storytelling
milestones.details: Package learnings into demos, videos, and technical write-ups.

Cloud Architect.overview: Design resilient, cost-aware cloud platforms that evolve with business needs.

milestones.title: Cloud Foundations
milestones.details: Review shared responsibility, service models, and reference architectures.
outcomes: Explain trade-offs between IaaS, PaaS, SaaS

milestones.title: Networking Strategy
milestones.details: Design VPC/VNet layouts, connectivity, and traffic inspection.

milestones.title: Compute & Orchestration
milestones.details: Compare containers, serverless, and managed runtimes.

milestones.title: Data & Storage
milestones.details: Architect storage tiers, databases, and data lifecycle policies.

milestones.title: Security Architecture
milestones.details: Embed identity, encryption, and monitoring from the start.

milestones.title: Automation & IaC
milestones.details: Scale infrastructure with pipelines, policy checks, and drift control.

milestones.title: Observability & Operations
milestones.details: Standardize logging, tracing, and runbooks across services.

milestones.title: Resilience Engineering
milestones.details: Model failure modes, disaster recovery, and chaos experiments.

milestones.title: FinOps
milestones.details: Track spend, allocate costs, and influence behavior through insights.

milestones.title: Governance & Compliance
milestones.details: Define policies, tagging standards, and lifecycle management.

milestones.title: Hybrid & Edge
milestones.details: Plan for edge computing, on-prem integration, and data gravity.

milestones.title: Innovation & Enablement
milestones.details: Coach teams, run architecture reviews, and document patterns.

Product Manager.overview: Guide cross-functional teams from discovery to delivery with clear strategy.

milestones.title: Market & Competitive Research
milestones.details: Assess market size, trends, and competitor positioning.

milestones.title: Customer Discovery
milestones.details: Run interviews, surveys, and diary studies for empathy.

milestones.title: Prioritization Frameworks
milestones.details: Apply RICE, Weighted Shortest Job First, and narrative roadmaps.

milestones.title: Stakeholder Alignment
milestones.details: Communicate effectively with execs, sales, design, and engineering.

milestones.title: Metrics & Instrumentation
milestones.details: Define north star metrics, guardrails, and analysis cadences.

milestones.title: Experimentation & Validation
milestones.details: Use prototyping, fake doors, and structured experiments.
outcomes: Design tests with clear success criteria

milestones.title: Roadmap Storytelling
milestones.details: Craft narratives that link vision to initiatives and outcomes.

milestones.title: Delivery Excellence
milestones.details: Partner with engineering to manage scope, risks, and quality.

milestones.title: Go-to-Market Planning
milestones.details: Coordinate launches, packaging, and customer education.

milestones.title: Scaling Product Operations
milestones.details: Implement tooling, rituals, and knowledge bases for growth.

milestones.title: Leadership & Coaching
milestones.details: Mentor PMs, nurture culture, and handle tough conversations.

milestones.title: Portfolio & Thought Leadership
milestones.details: Publish case studies and speak about outcomes achieved.

UX Designer.overview: Elevate research, interaction, and collaboration skills for human-centered products.

milestones.title: Research Foundations
milestones.details: Plan primary/secondary research mixes and recruiting strategies.

milestones.title: Information Architecture
milestones.details: Map navigation, taxonomy, and content strategy.
outcomes: Run card sorts and tree tests

milestones.title: Interaction Design
milestones.details: Craft flows, states, and error handling that feel intuitive.

milestones.title: Visual Systems
milestones.details: Build coherent typography, color, and iconography systems.

milestones.title: Accessibility Mastery
milestones.details: Embed inclusive design and assistive tech testing.

milestones.title: Rapid Prototyping
milestones.details: Use Figma, Framer, or ProtoPie for realistic demos.

milestones.title: Design Systems Collaboration
milestones.details: Contribute components, documentation, and governance.

milestones.title: Data-Informed Design
milestones.details: Pair qualitative insights with analytics and experimentation.

milestones.title: Cross-Functional Collaboration
milestones.details: Partner with PM and engineering to scope and deliver.

milestones.title: Testing & Validation
milestones.details: Facilitate usability tests, heuristic reviews, and accessibility checks.

milestones.title: Facilitation & Workshops
milestones.details: Lead ideation, prioritization, and design sprints.

milestones.title: Portfolio & Advocacy
milestones.details: Tell concise stories highlighting impact and craftsmanship.
